name.description: The name of the Log Profile. Changing this forces a

categories.description: List of categories of the logs.

locations.description: List of regions for which Activity Log events are stored or streamed.

storage_account_id.description: The resource ID of the storage account in which the Activity Log is stored. At least one of `storage_account_id` or `servicebus_rule_id` must be set.

retention_policy.description: A `retention_policy` block as documented below. A retention policy for how long Activity Logs are retained in the storage account.

enabled.description: A boolean value to indicate whether the retention policy is enabled.

days.description: The number of days for the retention policy. Defaults to 0.

id.description: The ID of the Log Profile.

create.description: Used when creating the Log Profile.

update.description: Used when updating the Log Profile.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Log Profile.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Log Profile.
